item.title: Broken swing, 28th August
item.description:
Hello!I was wondering if this swing will be fixed or replaced any time soon.It's one of the few in the area and I would like it to be fixed so I can take my chikdren there. So many things are getting damaged but not fixed in the playgrounds....so sad... Somebody should put a sign with weight limit so no adults will go in them....

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Goldfinch Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lights out in all 4 passages, 28th August

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A102, Kidbrooke, London

item.title: Generic House Waste left uncollected for weeks and weeks, 28th August
item.description:
Persistent issue regarding uncollected waste that has been left next to the bins in Bell Yard Mews. The waste has been sitting there for several weeks now and has still not been collected, despite being clearly placed near the designated bin area. Given the amount of time that has passed, this issue should have been resolved weeks ago. The situation is not only unsightly but is also becoming a unsettling as it looks like we live in a dump. I kindly request that this be addressed as a matter of urgency, and that steps be taken to ensure similar issues do not recur in the future. Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to seeing it resolved promptly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 151,153, Bermondsey Street, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
